column3: News;The story of a still unnamed foreigner who had a minor motorcycle accident with a Khmer family has gripped the nation
column4: with local people (including an okhna) expressing support for the man.------Many have called for the family to pay back the $250 the man reportedly gave after the collision
column5: with others wanting to track him down and give him some cash back
column6: after the way he dealt with the situation.------The latest news is that some local journalist managed to track down the woman in question and interview her. The lady is now the one apologizing
column7: and says she regrets taking the money. Video and latest source:------http://biz-kh.com/archives/27484------(if you missed the story so far…): ------https://cne.wtf/2018/10/27/foreigner-apologies-not-enough/------https://cne.wtf/2018/10/28/apologies-foreigner-forks-out-250/------ ------The video does take some time to get going…------(function(d
